name: Magnet Block
description:
Magnet Block is a simple 3d sokoban puzzle game.

The goal is to exit each puzzle through the teleporter.
Doing so requires the use and exploitation of the titular magnetically monopole blocks.

Opposites attract - Identical repulse.
The rules are simple but there are non trivial consequences to the world state.

Take the journey through 80 Puzzles. No filler.
